name: Anvil C8X Pisces Expedition
name_cn: 铁砧 C8X 双鱼座探索
description:
Manufacturer: Anvil Aerospace
Focus: Exploration / Pathfinder
Sporting more guns and a limited-edition livery, the C8X Pisces Expedition turns the stout snub into a perfectly viable standalone exploration vessel. With its compact frame, deft maneuverability, and seating for three, the Pisces Expedition is ready to take on its own adventures.
description_cn:
制造商：铁砧航天(Anvil Aerospace)
定位： 探索 / 探路者
C8双鱼座远征版拥有更强的火力和特殊的皮肤，完全可以作为独立的探索飞船。C8双鱼座远征版拥有紧凑的结构，灵敏的机动以及可提供给三人的座位，它随时准备着进行独立的探险。

shop_buy.layout_name_cn: 斯坦顿(Stanton)-弧光星(ArcCorp)-18区(Area18)-阿斯特罗无畏舰队
